name: payment-channel
description: Thunder - Ethereum Payment Channel System with instant, low-cost transactions

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:all
scripts.package:all: npm run package:thunderd && npm run package:cli
scripts.package:thunderd: pkg dist/thunderd/index.js --targets node16-linux-x64 --output ./bin/thunderd-linux && pkg dist/thunderd/index.js --targets node16-macos-x64 --output ./bin/thunderd-macos && pkg dist/thunderd/index.js --targets node16-macos-arm64 --output ./bin/thunderd-macos-arm64 && pkg dist/thunderd/index.js --targets node16-win-x64 --output ./bin/thunderd-win.exe
scripts.package:cli: pkg dist/thunder-cli/index.js --targets node16-linux-x64 --output ./bin/thunder-cli-linux && pkg dist/thunder-cli/index.js --targets node16-macos-x64 --output ./bin/thunder-cli-macos && pkg dist/thunder-cli/index.js --targets node16-macos-arm64 --output ./bin/thunder-cli-macos-arm64 && pkg dist/thunder-cli/index.js --targets node16-win-x64 --output ./bin/thunder-cli-win.exe

author: Thunder Team
